OtherRequirements.Title: Test Title
OtherRequirements.Description: You can have at most 2 500 level ECE courses.

OtherRequirements.Title: Test Title 2
OtherRequirements.Description: You need to have at least 5 ECE courses.

OtherRequirements.Title: Test Title 3
OtherRequirements.Description: You need to have at least 6 technical courses.
